sect1.title: Automatic override of std::cout and std::thread
sect1.para: There are preprocessor options to replace all occurences of std::cout and std::thread with calls to RcppThread::Rcout and RcppThread::Thread (provided that the RcppThread headers are included first). To enable this, use #defineRCPPTHREAD_OVERRIDE_COUT1//std::coutoverride #defineRCPPTHREAD_OVERRIDE_THREAD1//std::threadoverride
